name: @reflectjs/core
description: The simplest reactive web framework, built for Node.js and the browser.
author: Fabrizio Capolini

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/* && tsc && browserify dist/client/client-main.js -o dist/client.js && cp package.json dist && cp README.md dist && cp LICENSE dist
scripts.test: npm run build && mocha --exit -r ts-node/register test/**/*.test.ts
scripts.test:coverage: nyc npm run test && coverage-badges --output res/coverage-badge.svg
scripts.release:minor: npm version $(semver $npm_package_version -i minor) && npm publish ./dist --tag latest
scripts.release:patch: npm version $(semver $npm_package_version -i patch) && npm publish ./dist --tag latest
